attributes.comment:
PLEASE RECONSIDER THE INCREASE IN FEES RELATED TO THE
ADOPTION OF ORPHANS FROM FOREIGN COUNTRIES. FAMILIES WHO ARE
PURSUING THIS AVENUE FOR GROWING THEIR FAMILIES HAVE OFTEN
TIMES EXPLORED AND VENTURED DOWN OTHER AVENUES BEFORE
ARRIVING AT THE DECISION TO ADOPT FROM A FROEIGN COUNTRY. THEY
HAVE OFTEN SPENT A CONSIDERABLE AMOUNT OF THEIR RESOURCES
PRIOR TO MAKING THIS DECISION. THESE PARENTS WOULD NOT BE
INCURRING THESE EXPENSES IF THEY HAD BEEN ABLE TO HAVE
CHILDREN OF THEIR OWN OR IF THE PROCES OF ADOPTION IN THE US
WAS MORE OF A SURE THING. THE RAISING OF THESE FEES IS
ESPECIALLY TROUBLING FOR THOSE WHO HAVE CHOSEN TO ADOPT
FROM CHINA BECAUSE THEY NOT ONLY HAVE TO PAY THE FEES ONCE,
BUT BECAUSE OF THE INCREASED WAIT TIME ARE NOW HAVING TO HAVE
THEM DONE TWICE. THIS IMPOSES QUITE A HARDSHIP ON MANY OF THE
ADOPTING FAMILIES BECAUSE IT IS AN ADDITIONAL EXPENSE THAT
INITIALLY HAD NOT BEEN PLANNED ON. IT IS BAD ENOUGH THAT THESE
FAMILIES HAVE TO PAY THESE COSTS DONE ONCE, A FEE THAT WOULD
NOT BE INCURRED IF THEY WERE ABLE TO BEAR THEIR OWN CHILDREN
OR ADOPT DOMESTICALLY, BUT TO HAVE TO GO THROUGH THE PROCESS
AND COST TWICE IS ABSURD. THANK YOU FOR TAKING THE TIME TO
RECONSIDER THIS DECISION BEFORE MAKING YOUR FINAL DECISION.
